welcome_message_body: Welcome to Midsomer Norton, a charming town known for its rich history and beautiful countryside. We hope you enjoy your stay and take some time to explore all the hidden gems this city has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bristol Airport handles both international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: West Terminal
terminals.description: The West Terminal at Bristol Airport is primarily used for low-cost carriers and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Yeovilton Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Yeovilton Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at RAF Station Airport handles all commercial flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at RAF Station Airport is used for military operations and government flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Upavon Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
